body_html:
@jhseu Thanks for your response. Yes, working behind firewall. Got the solution to fix this.
Need to download the protobuf separately and install using pip install.

  1. Link to download protobuf : https://pypi.python.org/pypi/protobuf/3.1.0
  2. install protobuf-3.1.0-py2.py3-none-any.whl

After this step TensorFlow installation works for me.
body_text:
@jhseu Thanks for your response. Yes, working behind firewall. Got the solution to fix this.
Need to download the protobuf separately and install using pip install.

install protobuf-3.1.0-py2.py3-none-any.whl

After this step TensorFlow installation works for me.
body:
@jhseu Thanks for your response. Yes, working behind firewall. Got the solution to fix this.
Need to download the protobuf separately and install using pip install.
1) Link to download protobuf : https://pypi.python.org/pypi/protobuf/3.1.0
2) install protobuf-3.1.0-py2.py3-none-any.whl

After this step TensorFlow installation works for me.
